content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=0-2, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) with coal fuel, processing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (2,0) with coal fuel, processing iron ore

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates, fueled by coal

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Production line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Research Facility (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Science pack handling system:
- Lab for conducting research
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Errors
- Check if a technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Technologies like Logistics 2, Advanced Material Processing, Steel Processing, Automation, Automation 2, and Military Science were already completed

### Assembler Resource Shortage
- Ensure consistent supply of all required ingredients to assembling machines
- Current electronic circuit production is stalled due to copper cable shortage

### Power System Management
- Monitor boiler fuel levels regularly to maintain consistent power generation
- Keep coal supply adequate for all burner-type entities (inserters, furnaces, boiler)
